kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{student} = { name=Doutor Abelardo | email=drabelardo@gmail.com | age=56 | weight=77 | feet_tall=1.73 }

kw.name: Insert Student
kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'drabelardo@gmail.com'
insert into students (name, email, age, weight, feet_tall, created_at, updated_at)values('Doutor Abelardo','drabelardo@gmail.com',56,77,1.73, now(), now());

kw.msg: &{student} = { name=Paulão da Regulagem | email=paulao@gmail.com | age=56 | weight=77 | feet_tall=1.73 }

kw.name: Insert Student
kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'paulao@gmail.com'
insert into students (name, email, age, weight, feet_tall, created_at, updated_at)values('Paulão da Regulagem','paulao@gmail.com',56,77,1.73, now(), now());
